originalText.text: Before doing after school with Gotham Swim, my son Julian never liked getting into the pool. He always feared the water. Within a few weeks of being at Gotham Swim, his instructor Rick got him to swim under water. I highly recommend this program!

text.text: Before doing after school with Gotham Swim, my son Julian never liked getting into the pool. He always feared the water. Within a few weeks of being at Gotham Swim, his instructor Rick got him to swim under water. I highly recommend this program!

originalText.text:
I am incredibly pleased with the experience my 5 year old daughter has had at Gotham City Swim. Within just a few months of starting as a beginner she has learned new swimming techniques and is genuinely excited about each class. The instructor's positive & encouraging approach, along with their belief in my daughter's abilities, has undoubtedly played a key role in her progress.
A heartfelt thank you to Miles and Rick her swimming instructor for providing such an effective & supportive swim program.

originalText.text: Gotham City Swim has improved my son's swimming tremendously in just a few lessons so far. He is so comfortable and happy in the water now! We really can't believe it because he used to hate to swim. We had tried two other swim programs on the UES with very cold pools and were not seeing any progress. Miles at Gotham City Swim promised me that I would see improvement very quickly and he was true to his word. Their program and their instructors are fantastic. After much trial and error with other local swim programs, I am so happy we found Gotham City Swim and would highly recommend them to other families! My son is actually excited to swim each week now, which is a huge change.

originalText.text: Gotham swim has been great! My son has been swimming there for 2+ years and has made wonderful achievements. Miles, the owner, is always flexible and accommodating to the best of his abilities, understanding kids and their needs. My son was very hesitant to even put his face in the water and with patience from the instructor (Rick) he is now fully swimming laps!

originalText.text: We have been so happy with Gotham City Swim.  They were able to get both girls (ages 4 and 5) swimming independently in one semester.  The coaches are all wonderful and the girls really enjoy their time in the pool. Looking forward to continuing with Gotham and watching the girls improve their skills.
